acceptmarketplaceregistration.name: AcceptMarketplaceRegistration
acceptmarketplaceregistration.description: Grants permission to register the Amazon Web Services Marketplace token for your Amazon Web Services account to activate your Oracle Database@Amazon Web Services subscription

createcloudautonomousvmcluster.name: CreateCloudAutonomousVmCluster
createcloudautonomousvmcluster.description: Grants permission to create a new Autonomous VM cluster in the specified Exadata infrastructure

createcloudexadatainfrastructure.name: CreateCloudExadataInfrastructure
createcloudexadatainfrastructure.description: Grants permission to create an Exadata infrastructure

createcloudvmcluster.name: CreateCloudVmCluster
createcloudvmcluster.description: Grants permission to create a VM cluster on the specified Exadata infrastructure

createdbnode.name: CreateDbNode
createdbnode.description: Grants permission to create a DB Node

createodbnetwork.name: CreateOdbNetwork
createodbnetwork.description: Grants permission to create an ODB network

createodbpeeringconnection.name: CreateOdbPeeringConnection
createodbpeeringconnection.description: Grants permission to create an ODB Peering Connection

createoutboundintegration.name: CreateOutboundIntegration
createoutboundintegration.description: Grants permission to create an Outbound Integration

deletecloudautonomousvmcluster.name: DeleteCloudAutonomousVmCluster
deletecloudautonomousvmcluster.description: Grants permission to Deletes an Autonomous VM cluster

deletecloudexadatainfrastructure.name: DeleteCloudExadataInfrastructure
deletecloudexadatainfrastructure.description: Grants permission to delete a specified Exadata infrastructure. Before you use this operation, make sure to delete all of the VM clusters that are hosted on this Exadata infrastructure

deletecloudvmcluster.name: DeleteCloudVmCluster
deletecloudvmcluster.description: Grants permission to delete a specified VM cluster

deletedbnode.name: DeleteDbNode
deletedbnode.description: Grants permission to delete a DB Node

deleteodbnetwork.name: DeleteOdbNetwork
deleteodbnetwork.description: Grants permission to delete the specified ODB network

deleteodbpeeringconnection.name: DeleteOdbPeeringConnection
deleteodbpeeringconnection.description: Grants permission to delete the specified ODB Peering Connection. When you delete an ODB peering connection, the underlying VPC peering connection is also deleted

deleteresourcepolicy.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
deleteresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a resource policy

getcloudautonomousvmcluster.name: GetCloudAutonomousVmCluster
getcloudautonomousvmcluster.description: Grants permission to get information about a specific Autonomous VM cluster

getcloudexadatainfrastructure.name: GetCloudExadataInfrastructure
getcloudexadatainfrastructure.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified Exadata infrastructure

getcloudexadatainfrastructureunallocated.name: GetCloudExadataInfrastructureUnallocatedResources
getcloudexadatainfrastructureunallocated.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about unallocated resources in a specified Cloud Exadata Infrastructure

getcloudvmcluster.name: GetCloudVmCluster
getcloudvmcluster.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified VM cluster

getdbnode.name: GetDbNode
getdbnode.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified DB node

getdbserver.name: GetDbServer
getdbserver.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified database server

getocionboardingstatus.name: GetOciOnboardingStatus
getocionboardingstatus.description: Grants permission to get the tenancy activation link and onboarding status for your Amazon Web Services account

getodbnetwork.name: GetOdbNetwork
getodbnetwork.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified ODB network

getodbpeeringconnection.name: GetOdbPeeringConnection
getodbpeeringconnection.description: Grants permission to get information about the specified ODB Peering connection

getresourcepolicy.name: GetResourcePolicy
getresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to get a resource policy

initializeservice.name: InitializeService
initializeservice.description: Grants permission to initialize the ODB service for the first time in an account

listautonomousvirtualmachines.name: ListAutonomousVirtualMachines
listautonomousvirtualmachines.description: Grants permission to list all Autonomous VMs in an Autonomous VM cluster

listcloudautonomousvmclusters.name: ListCloudAutonomousVmClusters
listcloudautonomousvmclusters.description: Grants permission to list all Autonomous VM clusters in a specified Cloud Exadata infrastructure

listcloudexadatainfrastructures.name: ListCloudExadataInfrastructures
listcloudexadatainfrastructures.description: Grants permission to list information about the Exadata infrastructures owned by your Amazon Web Services account

listcloudvmclusters.name: ListCloudVmClusters
listcloudvmclusters.description: Grants permission to list information about the VM clusters owned by your Amazon Web Services account or only the ones on the specified Exadata infrastructure

listdbnodes.name: ListDbNodes
listdbnodes.description: Grants permission to list information about the DB nodes for the specified VM cluster

listdbservers.name: ListDbServers
listdbservers.description: Grants permission to list information about the database servers that belong to the specified Exadata infrastructure

listdbsystemshapes.name: ListDbSystemShapes
listdbsystemshapes.description: Grants permission to list information about the shapes that are available for an Exadata infrastructure

listgiversions.name: ListGiVersions
listgiversions.description: Grants permission to list information about Oracle Grid Infrastructure (GI) software versions that are available for a VM cluster for the specified shape

listodbnetworks.name: ListOdbNetworks
listodbnetworks.description: Grants permission to list information about the ODB networks owned by your Amazon Web Services account

listodbpeeringconnections.name: ListOdbPeeringConnections
listodbpeeringconnections.description: Grants permission to list all ODB peering connections or those associated with a specific ODB network

listsystemversions.name: ListSystemVersions
listsystemversions.description: Grants permission to list information about the system versions that are available for a VM cluster for the specified giVersion and shape

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list information about the tags applied to this resource

putresourcepolicy.name: PutResourcePolicy
putresourcepolicy.description: Grants permission to update a resource policy

rebootdbnode.name: RebootDbNode
rebootdbnode.description: Grants permission to reboot the specified DB node in a VM cluster

startdbnode.name: StartDbNode
startdbnode.description: Grants permission to start the specified DB node in a VM cluster

stopdbnode.name: StopDbNode
stopdbnode.description: Grants permission to stop the specified DB node in a VM cluster

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to apply tags to the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified resource

updatecloudexadatainfrastructure.name: UpdateCloudExadataInfrastructure
updatecloudexadatainfrastructure.description: Grants permission to update the properties of an Exadata infrastructure resource

updateodbnetwork.name: UpdateOdbNetwork
updateodbnetwork.description: Grants permission to update properties of a specified ODB network
